subject: Re:First SuCcessful Recordings
author: Nathan Sharman
full_text:
Has it ever occurred to you, that some one or
organisation, could be using a radio to say the things
you heard?

This whole radio and spirit voices, could be a MASSIVE
HOAX, perpetuated by some one with a sophisticated
multi-transmission two way radio.

Think about it.

THAT IS WHY I USE EVPmaker only to commuincate with
the other dimension.
